name: Break Free (itch) (PENGSO0O)
description:
💔 BREAK FREE
A top-down RPG style grid-based puzzle game about friendship and compassion. Follow the friends Jasper, Amber and Jade as they share a heart that allows them to move and do actions while trying to navigate a dungeon. Will they break free? Or will they succumb to their bickering and remain trapped forever?

🎮 Controls

- WASD - move and interact - left click on other character - pass heart

📝 Credits

Dallas Coggins - design, UI, programming, narrative director
Peter Schlenker - design, programming, art implementation, music, SFX, story
Carol Geng - in-game character design, art and animation, background art, story
Casey Pei - UI, tilemap, item, character and background art, story

🖥️ Tools / Software

- Unity, Visual Studio
- Procreate, FlipaClip, Ibis PaintX
- Musescore 4, an Otamatone
- Hiragino Mincho ProN (font)

Made in 36 hours for the 2023 Chillenium Game Jam!
